text: anyone have trouble getting the local hubl server to run on mojave? I installed Java and it's telling me it isn't installed.
Got it to work by downgrading to JDK 8

Ok, now a new question: what paths should I use for images on the local server if they’re in the files folder that I’m syncing up to HubSpot with ftp? I want to make sure the paths work when everything is uploaded to production. Thanks for your help!
